alert.note: Alert for Lee (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 6:17PM EDT until July 23 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Hawkins County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Hancock County in east Tennessee... South central Lee County in southwestern Virginia... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 616 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southeast of Jonesville, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kyles Ford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
